text:
Imane Anys ((Arabic pronunciation:); born 14 May 1996), better known by her online alias Pokimane, is a Moroccan-Canadian internet personality. She is a Twitch streamer and YouTuber.
Anys is best known for her live streams on Twitch, where she is best known for playing "League of Legends" and "Fortnite". She is a member of OfflineTV.
